item.title: Part 1 - Home Lab: How It All Started and My Initial Network Setup
item.description:

But for some reason, starting my home lab was something I kept putting off.

Procrastination and the Tipping Point

For months, I kept putting off starting my home lab. Every time I thought about it, the sheer amount of work involved made me pauseâ€”running Ethernet cables through the house, purchasing new hardware, and reconfiguring the network all felt overwhelming.
